summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Lake Forest Park Second Addition, Tract 44, Somerville, Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., vacated South Pearl Street, Parcel C, Section 12, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., Section 12, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., Section 276, Township 24 North, Range 4 East5, W.M., Section 1, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., Section 16, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
